title: 2013 Lunar New Year Cup
text:
The 87th 2013 Lunar New Year Cup (), also known as the China Mobile Satellite Communication Cup () due to sponsorship reason, is the annual <a href="Association%20football">football</a> event held in <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a> in <a href="Chinese%20New%20Year">Lunar New Year</a>. The name of this event was changed back to <a href="Lunar%20New%20Year%20Cup">Lunar New Year Cup</a> after two editions of Asian Challenge Cup were held in 2011 and 2012.
Public Vote of Hong Kong League XI Team.
Each <a href="Hong%20Kong%20First%20Division%20League">First Division League</a> team had nominated at most 4 <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defenders</a>, 3 <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>s and 3 <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forwards</a> for the public vote of Hong Kong League XI Team. 10 players with the highest number of vote from different position were selected to the team, while 2 <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeepers</a> and 6 other players were chosen by the head coach of the team, <a href="Josep%20Gombau">Josep Gombau</a>.
